Package aco

Interface AntColony

All Known Implementing Classes:
AntColonyClass
public interface AntColony
Represents a colony of Ants.

  • Method Details

    • addAnt

      boolean addAnt()
      Creates and adds an ant to the colony.
      Returns:
      True if the operation succeeded, false otherwise.

    • addAnt

      boolean addAnt(Ant ant)
      Adds the specified ant to the colony.
      Parameters:
      ant - - The ant to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the operation succeeded, false otherwise.

    • killColony

      void killColony()
      Kills the colony of ants.

    • getAnts

      Iterator<Ant> getAnts()
      Gets all the ants.
      Returns:
      An iterator with all the ants in the colony.

    • addCycle

      Iterator<Event> addCycle(AntCycle cycle)
      Adds a cycle to the collection of cycles already found.
      Parameters:
      cycle - - the new cycle to be added.
      Returns:
      An iterator with the events triggered by completing the specified cycle.

    • clearCycles

      void clearCycles()
      Clears the cycles.

    • getCycles

      Iterator<AntCycle> getCycles()
      Gets the cycles found in the path.
      Returns:
      An iterator with all the cycles already found.

    • evaporatePheromones

      Iterator<Event> evaporatePheromones(WeightedEdge<Integer> edge)
      Evaporates the pheromones in the edge.
      Parameters:
      edge - - The edge that will get his pheromones evaporated.
      Returns:
      an iterator with subsequent events.
